subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Dale Earnhardt Jr. has dropped to 11th in the Nascar Nextel Cup standings entering the Allstate 400 at the Brickyard.
snippet: Dale Earnhardt Jr. has dropped to 11th in the Nascar Nextel Cup standings entering the Allstate 400 at the Brickyard.
